len = ddt$LENGTH

# Chebyshevâ€™s theorem

# boxplot

z = (len - mean(len)) / sd(len)
head(z)

# R to calculate the exact proportion within 2 standard deviation of the mean.
exacttwo = length(len[abs(z) < 2]) / length(len)
